text: Does `{% dnd_area %}` work in HubSpot Blogpost template? for me when in add dnd tag it doesn't work in the blog post template. Does HubSpot has this limitation? :thinkonk:

Yes blog post template is not provide drag and drop feature Look this documtion
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/templates/drag-and-drop-areas>

if you need a module in blog post so plz paste module snippet in Template
